mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(loginId, password, nickName, gender, birthDate, region ) VALUES(#{loginId},#{password},#{nickName},#{gender},#{birthDate},#{region});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE loginId = #{loginId} AND password = #{password};
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nickName=#{nickName}, region = #{region} WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE user SET status = -1 WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE user SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id};
